snippet: Eric Hosmer hit a three-run double, and starter Edinson Volquez went seven innings after a shaky start.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Kansas City Royals defeat Minnesota Twins, 4-2; other MLB scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Eric Hosmer hit a three-run double, and starter Edinson Volquez went seven innings after a shaky start.

headline.print_headline: Royals End Four-Game Losing Streak; Blue Jays Increase Lead
headline.main: Royals End Four-Game Losing Streak; Blue Jays Increase Lead
